assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The study protocol was approved by the Institutional Review Board of the Christian Medical College (CMC), Vellore and Institutional Ethics Committee of the National Institute of Mental Health and Neuro Sciences (NIMHANS), Bengaluru, India. Subjects were recruited after the appropriate consenting process. The initial part of this work was carried out at CMC where GA was working as a faculty in the department of Clinical Genetics. Since GA moved to NIMHANS, the rest of the work was completed at NIMHANS.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
